name: Graham Smith
text: This is the friendliest FBO I fly into.  We fly into Gulf Shores several times a year.  My needs are always met and they go out of their way to accommodate you. I am always happy to greet everyone at Platinum Aviation when we come to Gulf Shores.  They prove service and friendliness builds loyalty. The employees care and it shows.

name: Heath Lawrence
text: Extremely helpful and courteous staff here! Truly above and beyond. We had a tough time this past weekend, but the people at Platinum made it the best it could’ve been! First off, our Taxi no showed us, and there were no Lyft drivers available, so I desperately called the FBO for help finding a taxi. They didn’t send a taxi, they came and picked us up in their courtesy car! Then we burned up a starter in our Baron, so they let us borrow the courtesy car while we waited for rescue, and also gave the kids crayons and coloring books to keep them entertained while we waited! They even tried to find us a mechanic, but we didn’t get that lucky on a Sunday! So, on top of their great fuel prices and normal stuff they do a great job of, they went the extra mile, and then another mile, to make our crappy day a lot less crappy! This is definitely where I’ll go when I’m traveling to Gulf Shores again.

name: Patrick
text:
Top shelf FBO!  Flew in last night 8/24.  First time using platinum as my regular FBO wouldn’t answer the phone.  Platinum answered the call, let us use the crew car, topped off our tanks, and rolled out the carpet for our little Piper.  We were treated like we flew a GV.

Excellent facility and staff

Thank you for making our stop a delight.

name: Eddie Cobern
text: You won't get better treatment or prices from anyone else. These people go Obove  and beyond expected aviation services. There the only FBO for us.give them a try you won't be disappointed!

name: Alfredo Rohweder
text: Above and beyond in customer service. They are hungry for your business and are striving hard to earn it. Currently a temporary building away from other FBO's but very clean and well appointed. I was told they are building a large permanent facility. Cheapest fuel. Not listed on my Garmin App.

name: tony piesco
text: Super nice staff, and management.  Airport to the stars

name: Angelo Trovato
text: Welcome to Platinum Air Center.

name: Chris Reid
text: Literally the only physical store to get supplies for Army flight training! Get all the things that the Army does not provide for proper training. The equipment is great, and they have a wide variety. The store is well stocked, and the staff is very friendly.

name: Terrence Kurasz
text: Enjoyed the friendly atmosphere of the sale associate's!!

name: Anna Weiland
text: They always have to exactly what we need, when we need, all for really good prices. Made my husband's life so much easier going through flight school. Even found all of our family gifts here.

name: Gabriel Escudero
text: They have all that you need to survive flight school!

name: Corbin McKeon
text: This store cares about themselves and not the customer. The store clerk suggested I prepay for a checklist and pick it up the following week. By the time I came to pick it up, a different version was available. They refused to do a 1:1 trade and wouldn’t refund my money. Scam, scam, scam. Guess you can do what you want if your the only show in town.

name: Ya Wk
text:
This is experience coming out of Common Core: Get maps cut + EP fill-in book and a knee board. If you buy the SERE survival kit, I’m sorry. Do not get the lip lights or any lights here, once you get to the phase you’ll see how the amount spent wasn’t necessary.

Do not listen to the people that work there on what you need to get! They will make it sound like everything is a required item, citing “an IP told me” or “People have been saying” with no validity. Most things you can find on Fort Rucker for a lot cheaper and the night time flight lights are at the Clothing and Sales for so much cheaper.

Attitude of the store is I dare you to not have to spend money here. They are too complacent knowing they are the only ones around so the customer service can be described as condescending  at best. Rather than be accommodating they’re more with the approach of “we are the only ones around here so what are you going to do?”

name: Brandon Lewis
text: Preferred this place over the barbershop on post because of their dumb mask policies but i walk in on a saturday and there is 1 person getting their hair cut and im turned away because I didn’t “make an appointment” ill just start going elsewhere I guess

name: Outstanding Lyfe
text: This place gets better and better with time. They have great study resources BUT I recommend confirming your desired date of publication for pubs before purchasing. If you're with a unit, get pubs for free instead of ordering through the hangar.

name: Rabeea Jabbar
text: Cute gifty things. My husband goes here all the time to buy school supplies but they have so many other cute things. Staff is always friendly.

name: Eric Schwind
text: Friendly staff, and very useful items you can't get anywhere else.

name: Steven Wolf
text: Pricey but reliable.

name: Daniel Hobbs
text: High price on a lot of stuff but make things q lot easier

name: Bill Brockhaus
text: Great staff, they had my dog tags and leather name tags done much quicker than promised.

name: Eric Sikes
text: Friendly staff.

name: Christopher Cannon
text: Love The Hangar. I didn't appreciate them when I was here for flight school but now I know - there are very few places like this out there.

name: Amanda Hatfield
text: Great, friendly, and everything you need for flight!

name: Kenneth Muna
text: Very nice ppl.  Great service.  Lots of products related to aviation.

name: Hieu 2
text:
It is a nice store with decent selections of aviation products. It is kind of pricey.

WARNING: Don't buy UH 72 EP Flashcards

Bought the EP flashcards for UH-72 in preparation for DES.

Found 4 errors on it. Two of which were blatantly wrong EPs. Of course you cannot get a refund when you see the error and email them about it. You might get a free beer koozie instead.

name: Jack Taylor
text: They were willing to do overnight emboidering for a father's day gift :)

name: Zack F
text: Very helpful, friendly staff and a great selection

name: Carol wright
text: Nice military related items

name: Tyler Chaney
text: Decent selection, but the prices are definitely steep. Given the lack of options in the area, it works.

name: Turo Tales
text: Gotta love the hangar.

name: Scott E
text: Overpriced, limited options for flight gear.  Place can't decide if it's dedicated for flight students or a Hallmark shop for trinkets.

name: Greatus Soldiera
text: Pricey items, a decent of selection

name: Hannah Stanley
text: Fun place

name: Rich Oros
text: Friendly and the only place to get helicopter specialty items.

name: Karem Awad
text: Good store for aviation supplies , study materials , name tags , expensive .

name: James Wells
text: If you need your airplane motor worked on this is the place
